entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Whitby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:30 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches overnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 early this evening then light near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
